# Government Tender Announcement for Automated VRI Control System

## Solicitation Number
WS4164109688

## Tender Name
Automated VRI Control System - Outlook

## Amendment Number
2

## Publication Date
September 15, 2023

## Tender Closing Date
October 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) invites you to submit a proposal to provide a single Automated Site-Specific Variable Rate Irrigation (SS-VRI) control system. The system will need to be deployed in Outlook.

## Background

The Automated VRI Control System aims to modernize the irrigation system and enhance efficiency. The scope of the project includes designing, testing, installing, and delivering the SS-VRI control system.

## Key Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: Outlook
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Luke Cao (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important Notes

* The tender closing date is October 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.
* All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery and Canada Buys.
* The system must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on the closing date. Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

Visit the Ariba Discovery website for more information and to access the tender documents: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17451672.
